content.question: Which of the following groups would have most objected to the development evidenced in the photograph?

choices.label: Anticommunists seeking to show the superiority of the United States
Republican politicians opposed to the growth of federal spending
Young people who rejected the homogenization of culture
Civil rights activists protesting for voting rights

content.answer: Young people who rejected the homogenization of culture

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
